title: Sleeping Hitman

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You're asleep for the first day/night cycle that you exist as a Sleeping Hitman. (You can't talk, vote, use day abilities, or use night abilities.)
Abilities:
- Attack a player each night when you're not asleep.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4672
*Hack-he what? Sorry, I fell asleep.*
